en_CA {
    Version { "2.0" }
    NumberPatterns {
        "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
        "\u00A4#,##0.00;(\u00A4#,##0.00)",
        "#,##0%",
        "#E0",
    }

    // Currency display names
    Currencies {
        CAD { "$", "Canadian Dollar" }
        USD { "US$", "US Dollar" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                "h:mm:ss a z",
                "h:mm:ss a z",
                "h:mm:ss a",
                "h:mm a",
                "EEEE, MMMM d, yyyy",
                "MMMM d, yyyy",
                "d-MMM-yy",
                "dd/MM/yy",
                "{1} {0}",
            }
        }
    }
}
